DOC.brief_title: Norwegian Study Persistent Atrial Fibrillation Treatment : Cryoballoon Versus Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose randomize clinical trial compare efficacy safety pulmonary vein isolation either second generation cryoballoon ( Arctic Front Advance™ ) radiofrequency ablation technique irrigate ablation catheter ( TactiCath™ Quartz ) . A total 128 patient persistent longstanding persistent atrial fibrillation randomize either radiofrequency cryoballoon ablation treatment . With technique , pulmonary vein isolation perform confirmed circular mapping catheter . The primary endpoint freedom atrial arrhythmia recurrence 12 months.Treatment success evaluate use 12-lead electrocardiography 7-day Holter recording .
